channel.title: Testscape
channel.description:
Hello. I got some problems with my compiler & Testscape server. I've followed "The Ultimate Server Guide" That speaks my language (noob), but i still get errors. When i try to run the compiler: Note: stream.java uses or overides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. ...
When i start my Testscape server, and type the ip, It gives me this error: An exception occured in getCodeBase(): java.net.MalformedURLException: For input string: "43594:80"
I hope you can help me...
- THeNiNJa

item.title: Testscape
item.dc:creator: @THeNiNJa THeNiNJa
item.description:
@THeNiNJa wrote:

Actually 0.0.0.0:43594, but i will try 127…[br][size=1]Posted on: January 02, 2007, 04:16:40 AM[/size][hr]Now i get a message to start a new server…[br][size=1]Posted on: January 02, 2007, 04:18:16 AM[/size][hr]It is working!
Thanks to everyone but bob_java!

Read full topic

item.title: Testscape
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Lemme guess; you put 127.0.0.1:43594 as the IP ? Well DON’T. Just put in 127.0.0.1.

Read full topic

Can you help me?

item.title: Testscape

item.description:
@xdeathxmagex wrote:

Note: stream.java uses or overides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
…
This is not an error, it is supposed to say that.

And we do not bump or double post our topics.

xdeathxmagex
